Address.label: Address
Address.value: 32 WIGGINS AVENUE, BEDFORD, Massachusetts, 01730, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Anika Therapeutics Inc is an orthopedic medicines company. It is committed to improving the lives of patients with degenerative orthopedic diseases and traumatic conditions with clinically meaningful therapies. The company focuses on orthopedics, including osteoarthritis pain management, regenerative solutions, soft tissue repair, and bone preserving joint technologies. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the United States.

value.name: Anne M. Nunes
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
